item.title: Getting things done
item.dc:creator: easyG
item.description: If you want to get things done, you will probably want a to do list. Over the years we've tried many, and until recently have been using any.do, which integrates nicely with Google Tasks. This week we're trying a new to do list that replaces the new tab page in Google Chrome. I really like […]
item.content:encoded:
If you want to get things done, you will probably want a to do list. Over the years we've tried many,

and until recently have been using any.do, which integrates nicely with Google Tasks. This week we're trying a new to do list that replaces the new tab page in Google Chrome. I really like it. Let me know what you think about Dayboard
